TopicTitle: How Do I Use the Launcher to Launch the Steam Version Of KSP?

Articles.Content: Since I got the 0.22 update, I wanted to play KSP a lot more than before. And since I had the Steam Version of KSP, starting the game took a while (and I'm super lazy:P) . So I was going through the game files looking for KSP.exe, so I can make a desktop shourtcut. Then I found the launcher (Launcher.exe). So I opened that up but the options for play and update are grayed out. If there is one, can you help me find a way around it? Thanks.
